problem.p: A uniform disk of mass \(m\) and radius \(R\) is rolling without slipping along a horizontal surface as shown in the figure below. Its center of mass is moving at speed \(v\).
What is the magnitude and the direction of the angular momentum of the disk about the point \(Q\) fixed on the table? Express your answer in terms of \(m\), \(R\) and \(v\).
